mapper.select: WITH BUYERVIEW AS ( SELECT BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_LGU, BUYER_BANK, BUYER_BANKNO, BUYER_BANKNAME, BUYER_ZIP, BUYER_ADD1, BUYER_ADD2, BUYER_COMTEL, BUYER_FAX, BUYER_MAIL, BUYER_CHARGER, BUYER_TELEXT , LPROD_NM FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON (BUYER_LGU = LPROD_GU) WHERE BUYER_ID = #{buyer_id} ) SELECT BUYERVIEW.* , PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE , PROD_SALE, PROD_OUTLINE, PROD_MILEAGE FROM BUYERVIEW LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD ON (BUYER_ID = PROD_BUYER)
